pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, October 19, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting of the Youth Council.

Rosedale Park Room, Hotel X Toronto
111 Princesâ€™ Boulevard

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the door right of the main entrance no later than 10:30 a.m.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral of the Honourable Donald MacDonald, and will deliver remarks.  

Closed to media

Cobourg, Ontario

6:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with local dairy industry representatives.

Closed to media
